item.description:
Hey Everyone,

This Friday Sam Roberts will be performing at Brighton Music Hall. We will be meeting for a drink before the show at Big City (138 Brighton Avenue - near the corner of Brighton Ave and Harvard Avenue). We will be upstairs near the main bar.

Tickets for show can be purchased at http://www.ticketmaster.com/event/0100466CB203B3F6 and are 15 dollars in advance.

We will be heading over for the show at around 9 PM. Brighton Music Hall is just down the street from Big City.

 

Thanks,

 

Canadian Expat Group
item.how_to_find_us: Meet us Big City for a drink before the show

group.name: The Boston Expat Canadian Meetup Group

item.name: Sam Roberts Band
